TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied to its class definition.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Type> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AttributeType value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The to compare to the current .
Docs.summary: Determines whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
Docs.returns: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
